attributes.action: Create a new Law which makes it illegal to tell lies as an elected MP
attributes.additional_details: This new Law could be brought in at the next General Election and would become legally binding as soon as the MP or Lord is elected to each House.
attributes.background: Telling lies in the Houses of Parliament , both in the Commons and the Lords is becoming all too common. Let's stop it going any further by imposing a One Year jail sentence on all perpetrators.
